__[Get Action|http://open-forum.onestonesoup.org/OpenForum/Documentation/Reference/UsingWikiActions]__  Lists the History of a Page
----
!!Get Parameters
*pageName - The name of the page to display the history of

----
!!Server Side Javascript for GET method
{{{ if(typeof(pageName)=="undefined")
{
	transaction.setResult(transaction.SHOW_PAGE);
}
else
{
	user = transaction.getUser();
	page = wiki.buildHistoryPage(pageName);
	transaction.sendPage(page);
} }}}
